questions.question_text_1: A software organization is developing a web application to collect and address the grievances of its employees in a systematic manner. Identify the type of client for the web application discussed above.
question_texts: A software organization is developing a web application to collect and address the grievances of its employees in a systematic manner. Identify the type of client for the web application discussed above.

options.option_text: a software or a software component.
The customers who makes purchase using the mobile application
The organization who sales the handcrafted jewelry using the mobileapplication
The preapproved jewellers who makes the jewelry as per the design given bythe customers

questions.question_text_1: Which of the following requirement gathering technique is best suite for getting answers to specific questions from a large group of people?
question_texts: Which of the following requirement gathering technique is best suite for getting answers to specific questions from a large group of people?

questions.question_text_1: An organization has developed a web application to collect and address the grievances of its employees in a systematic manner. However, employees find the system difficult to use, and they have to go to the help page to understand how the system can be used properly. Which of the usability goals is missing in the given web application?
question_texts: An organization has developed a web application to collect and address the grievances of its employees in a systematic manner. However, employees find the system difficult to use, and they have to go to the help page to understand how the system can be used properly. Which of the usability goals is missing in the given web application?

questions.question_text_1: A prototype of a software product is presented as printed or hand-sketched drawings of user interfaces of different screens (of the software product) on multiple papers. Identify the type of the given prototype.
question_texts: A prototype of a software product is presented as printed or hand-sketched drawings of user interfaces of different screens (of the software product) on multiple papers. Identify the type of the given prototype.

questions.question_text_1: Suppose you are designing a web application that allows advance booking of movie tickets in metro cities. The web application allows the users to explore different movies screened in different cinema halls and multiplexes and also find descriptions and ratings of the movies without registering or signing in to the web application. However, to book movie tickets, the user is required to sign in to the web application. Which of the following heuristics of UI evaluation is fulfilled in this case?
question_texts: Suppose you are designing a web application that allows advance booking of movie tickets in metro cities. The web application allows the users to explore different movies screened in different cinema halls and multiplexes and also find descriptions and ratings of the movies without registering or signing in to the web application. However, to book movie tickets, the user is required to sign in to the web application. Which of the following heuristics of UI evaluation is fulfilled in this case?

questions.question_text_1: For a given software system, the modules share a lot of data among themselves, requiring extensive interaction between the modules, and functions in each module perform a single objective.  Identify the statement that is correct about the software.
question_texts: For a given software system, the modules share a lot of data among themselves, requiring extensive interaction between the modules, and functions in each module perform a single objective.  Identify the statement that is correct about the software.

options.option_text: The modules have high coupling and high cohesion.
The modules have high coupling and low cohesion.
The modules have low coupling and high cohesion.
The modules have low coupling and low cohesion.

questions.question_text_1: Consider a module in which a set of functions are defined to be executed one after the other, each of which works towards an entirely different purpose.  Identify the type of cohesion for the given module.
question_texts: Consider a module in which a set of functions are defined to be executed one after the other, each of which works towards an entirely different purpose.  Identify the type of cohesion for the given module.

questions.question_text_1: Which of the following statements are true about design phase of software development process?
question_texts: Which of the following statements are true about design phase of software development process?

options.option_text: It provides a big picture of the software system to be implemented
The developers write code based on the requirements
It provides a structure of the software system to be implemented
It ensures that the implemented software behave according to therequirements
Implementation of Component Diagram starts after the implementations ofboth User Interface and Database Schema are completed.
Implementations of both User Interface and Database Schema are required tobe completed before the implementation of Restaurant Management begins.
User Interface and Database Schema can be implemented simultaneously.
No part of Payment Tracking, Order Tracking, and Route Management can beimplemented simultaneously due to strong interdependencies.

questions.question_text_1: A startup company is planning to develop an online daily planner app. However, since there are already many similar products on the market, the risk associated with developing the product is that it may not be competitive in the market.  Based on the above data, answer the given subquestions.
question_texts: A startup company is planning to develop an online daily planner app. However, since there are already many similar products on the market, the risk associated with developing the product is that it may not be competitive in the market.  Based on the above data, answer the given subquestions.

questions.question_text_1: Identify the type of the risk in the given scenario.
question_texts: Identify the type of the risk in the given scenario.

questions.question_text_1: Select the correct option that specifies how the risk can be mitigated.
question_texts: Select the correct option that specifies how the risk can be mitigated.

options.option_text: By communicating with clients or build prototype to collect clients feedback
By benchmarking and regular inspection to verify that the external componentis up to the mark.
By hiring developers with relevant experience within the company and/oroutside the company, or outsource certain things to some third party vendors.
